name: Texas Beef Soup
author: Kim Richard
summary: A hearty soup that even your husband will like. My husband, who thinks soups are for the faint of heart, loves this recipe! It's so quick and easy because of using the slow cooker. It's sure to be a family favorite!
ingredients: 1 tablespoon seasoning salt, or to taste
½  green bell pepper, finely chopped
1 (11.5 fl oz) can spicy vegetable juice cocktail
directions: Heat the olive oil in a large heavy skillet
Season the stew meat with seasoning salt and pepper
Cook meat in the oil along with onion and bell pepper until browned
Transfer to a slow cooker, and stir in the beef broth
Cook on Low for 6 to 8 hours, or until meat is tender
During the last 30 minutes, stir in the mixed vegetables and vegetable juice cocktail
